mapper.select: select from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER ORDER by FOLDER_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER ORDER by FOLDER_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(FOLDER_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(FOLDER_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER

select * from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER where FOLDER_ORDER_NUM = (select max(FOLDER_ORDER_NUM) from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER where FOLDER_ORDER_NUM<(select FOLDER_ORDER_NUM from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER where FOLDER_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER where FOLDER_ORDER_NUM = (select min(FOLDER_ORDER_NUM) from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER where FOLDER_ORDER_NUM>(select FOLDER_ORDER_NUM from TBUILD_SITE_FOLDER where FOLDER_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
